title: Correlation: Coffee and the Weather
question_text: A small neighborhood coffee shop sells both hot coffee drinks and iced coffee drinks.  The owners of the coffee shop decided to investigate the relationship between the outside high  temperature on a given day and the number of hot coffee drinks that they are able to sell that day.
